channel.title: Cela on Readers' Advisory blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cela on Readers' Advisory blog

item.title: CELA now has DAISY text magazines
item.description: This is a very exciting development, in my opinion. I do like to read magazines from time to time, but the ones that CELA offered frankly don’t interest me (apart from L’Actualit√© and, sometimes, MacLean’s magazine). The new offerings include WIRED magazine, though, which makes me really happy. What is a DAISY book? In case you don’t know, DAISY is an accessible format that allows visually-impaired people to navigate books, create bookmarks, and generally use a book the way a sighted person would, only by listening.
